menu.menudata: select ifnull(albums.year,0),ifnull(albums.year,'Unknown') from albums group by albums.year order by albums.year asc
select albums.id,albums.title,substr(albums.titlesort,1,1) from albums where ifnull(albums.year,0)={year} order by albums.titlesort
select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and ifnull(tracks.year,0)={year} group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
